translator_name: For translators: If you are translating this file, put in your name here. This will be present in the credits section.
translator_url: For translators: If you do have any social link, you can also put it here, the credits section will link to your profile.
cancel_text: Are you sure you want to cancel? All changes will be lost!
unsaved_close: Are you sure you want to close? All changes will be lost!
name: Name
scan_modlist: Scan Modlist for required and installed Translations
scanning_modlist: Scanning Modlist for required and installed Translations...
scan_nm_translations: Scan Nexus Mods for available Translations
scanning_nm_translations: Scanning Nexus Mods for available Translations...
delete_text: Are you sure you want to delete? This cannot be undone!

build_dictionary:
Build Dictionary for Dynamic String Distributor Plugin
(This must be done everytime after you edited, installed or deleted a translation!)
api_limit_hint: The hourly limit only applies if the daily limit has been used up.
deep_scan:
Scan Plugins with installed Translations for untranslated Strings
(This can take a while, depending on the number of Plugins and installed Translations)
unfinished_downloads: Are you sure you want to exit? There are still unfinished Downloads!
unsaved_exit: Are you sure you want to exit? There are still unsaved Translations open in Editor. All unsaved changes will be lost!
show_structure: Show Plugin Structure (Warning: this may take a while)
